===============================
GF: Lisp-Like generic Functions
===============================

Lisp-like generic functions for python.

Overview
========
See the `overview.rst <docs/overview.rst>`_ file in the `docs <docs>`_ directory
of the source archive.

Documentation
=============
The remaining documentation is in the directory `docs <docs>`.
